content: round 16 ​decrease in w 2sc in b decrease in w single_crochet in b single_crochet in w decrease in b 2sc decrease 2sc in w 12 stitches finish stuffing round 17 ​ decrease six times in w 6 stitches © laura s pixie patch 9 make the ears back legs and tail as detailed in the european rabbit pattern english lop the english lop is unmistakable with its oversized ears if you want to make one in all one colour then use the english lop ear pattern with the european rabbit pattern for the body legs and tail in this pattern w is for white and b for brown i used stylecraft special in mocha round 1 ​in b make 6sc into m r 6 stitches round 2 ​ increase single_crochet three times in b 9 stitches round 3 ​ in b single_crochet increase single_crochet in w single_crochet increase single_crochet twice times 9 stitches round 4 ​ in w 2sc in b 3sc in w single_crochet in same stitch as previous single_crochet 7sc 13 stitches round 5 ​in w single_crochet in b 2sc in w 3sc in b 2sc in w 2sc increase single_crochet increase 15 stitches round 6 ​ in w 2sc in b 2sc in w 2sc in b 2sc in w 2sc increase 2sc increase single_crochet 17 stitches round 7 ​in w 2sc in b single_crochet in w 4sc in b single_crochet in w 3sc b s 2sc b s 2sc 17 stitches insert safety eyes if using between rounds 4 and 5 round 8 ​3sc in w single_crochet decrease single_crochet in b 10sc in w 16 stitches round 9 ​single_crochet around in w 16 stitches © laura s pixie patch 10 round 10 ​4sc in w 3sc in b 9sc in w 16 stitches round 11 ​ increase 2sc increase in w 2sc increase in b 2sc increase 6sc in w 20 stitches round 12 ​ 5sc in w 6sc in b 9sc in w 20 stitches round 13 ​6sc in w 4sc in b 10sc in w 20 stitches stuff the head round 14 ​5sc in w decrease 2sc decrease in b 9sc in w 18 stitches round 15 ​4sc in w decrease 2sc decrease in b 8sc in w 16 stitches round 16 ​ decrease 2sc in w decrease 2sc in b decrease 2sc twice in w 12 stitches stuff the body round 17 ​decrease 6 times in w 6 stitches english lop ears make 2 chain 8 single_crochet in second chain from hook single_crochet in each of next 2 chain half_double_crochet in next 3 chain 5dc in final chain 3hdc along the back of next 3 chain 3sc along back of next 3 chain fasten_off leaving long yarn tail for sewing sew ears to head and weave in ends jersey wooly a fairly new breed the jersey wooly is a fairly small rabbit with a docile nature and an easy care coat there are many colour variations but the sample is made in
